title: In search of two typefaces
content:
A week ago or so, i came up with a website of an author of typefaces called “closer” and “pick-up”. Rather than bookmark the website i wrote down names of typefaces in hope of later purchase; now in desperate search of that website since i can’t find this two typefaces anywhere on the web.

Google is returning results regarding “picking up the right font” and “using the font wich is closer to ..” not paying attention to zilion of my keyword combinations and tricks.

I’d be very grateful for any information regarding this two typefaces!

 [‹ greek ductus](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205012449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33869 "Go to previous forum topic") [Headline Serif to Compliment Dax ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081205012449/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33969 "Go to next forum topic")
author: KhoNS

comments.content:
This is where I’d open up Google Desktop and start searching, it’s saved my butt a million time for this very thing.

Alas, I don’t know of either of those fonts or where/who to get them from.

Randy thanks a lot!

Unfortunately i realized that typeface is not for sale. I even tried contacting the authors about the option of purchasing it, but with no reply.
